chatBot.greeting: Hello! How can I help you today? Feel free to ask about our AI services.

chatBot.searchingInfo: Searching for information in our knowledge base...
chatBot.fallbackResponse: I couldn't find an exact answer to your question. Please clarify or ask a different question.
chatBot.rateLimit: Please wait a few seconds before sending another message.

meta.title: VetCall AI – 24/7 Phone Assistant for Veterinary Clinics in Austria
meta.description: Less phone stress, more patient time. VetCall AI answers calls, handles FAQs, and books appointments – even on weekends. GDPR-compliant, 14-day free trial.

hero.title: 24/7 phone assistant for your vet practice
hero.subtitle: Less phone stress, more patient time: VetCall AI answers calls, handles common questions, and books appointments – even on weekends.

pain.title: Too many calls. Too little time.

point2.title: Repetitive questions
point2.description: Opening hours, prices, vaccinations: answered automatically.

step1.title: Call arrives
step1.description: VetCall AI picks up (even outside business hours).

step3.title: Takes action
step3.description: Suggest/book appointment, send emergency service, message via WhatsApp/SMS.

benefits.title: Why VetCall AI?
benefits.subtitle: More time for what really matters
benefits.benefit2: More booked appointments, fewer missed calls

testimonial1.text: VetCall AI reduced our phone load by 50%. Our team can finally focus on patients.
testimonial1.author: Dr. Maria Schmidt

testimonial2.text: The weekend emergency forwarding is worth gold. No more missed emergencies.
testimonial2.author: Dr. Thomas Müller

testimonial3.text: Easy setup, immediate results. The best investment for our practice.
testimonial3.author: Dr. Anna Weber

pricing.title: Transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your practice

q1.question: Do we need to change our phone number?
q1.answer: No. We start with call forwarding. Your existing number stays the same.

q2.question: Does VetCall AI really book appointments?
q2.answer: Yes, via your Google/Outlook calendar. VetCall AI checks available times and books directly.

q3.question: How does emergency service work?
q3.answer: Callers receive the nearest veterinary emergency service via SMS/WhatsApp, we can connect directly if desired.

q4.question: Is this GDPR-compliant?
q4.answer: Yes. EU hosting, 60-90 day retention, data processing agreement (DPA).

q5.question: Does VetCall AI give medical advice?
q5.answer: No. Only organization & information. Medical advice is provided by veterinarians.

q6.question: How quickly can I start?
q6.answer: Within 24 hours of signup. We set everything up for you.

compliance.title: Privacy & compliance
compliance.description: VetCall AI is fully GDPR-compliant. All data is hosted in the EU and automatically deleted after 60-90 days.
compliance.disclaimer: This is not an emergency channel (112/144).

finalCta.title: Start today, less phone stress tomorrow.
finalCta.subtitle: Join dozens of veterinary practices across Austria

form.title: Start your free trial
form.subtitle: Fill out the form and we'll set everything up for you.
form.successMessage: We've received your request and will contact you within 24 hours.
form.errorMessage: An error occurred. Please try again or contact us directly.

hero.title: Tired of high electricity costs?
hero.subtitle: Join Austria's energy community and start saving today
hero.description: Every month, you overpay for electricity. Average Austrian households spend €150-250/month on energy. But there's a better way.

problem.title: The hidden costs in your electricity bill
problem.subtitle: Why traditional energy providers cost you more

point1.title: Constantly rising prices
point1.description: Energy prices have increased by 40% in the last two years, and traditional providers pass all costs to consumers

point2.title: Hidden fees
point2.description: Network fees, taxes, and additional charges make up to 60% of your bill

point3.title: No control
point3.description: You're locked into long-term contracts with no say in pricing or energy sources

solution.title: How energy communities change the game
solution.subtitle: A smarter way to consume electricity
solution.intro: Energy communities (Energiegemeinschaften) are a revolutionary concept where neighbors share locally produced renewable energy, cutting out middlemen and reducing costs.

benefit1.title: Direct savings
benefit1.description: Pay only 8¢/kWh for consumed electricity — significantly below market rates

benefit2.title: Full transparency
benefit2.description: See exactly where your energy comes from and how costs are calculated

benefit3.title: Sustainable future
benefit3.description: Support local renewable energy and reduce your carbon footprint

benefit4.title: Minimal commitment
benefit4.description: Join with just €10 deposit and €10 one-time membership fee

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: No hidden fees, no surprises

consumption.title: Consumption price
consumption.description: Pay only for what you use

pricing.comparison: Compare this to average market rates of 25-35¢/kWh

cta.title: Ready to start saving?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of Austrian households already benefiting from energy communities
cta.guarantee: Cancel anytime • No long-term contracts • 100% renewable energy
